description.en: Attacks an enemy and activates a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from two allies with the highest Attack.
description.kr: 적을 공격하고 가장 공격력이 높은 아군 2명의 <color=#28d9ed>협공</color>을 발생시킵니다.
description.jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、攻撃力が最も高い味方2体に<color=#28d9ed>連携</color>を発生させる。
description.zh: 攻击敌人,并使攻击力最高的2名友军发动<color=#28d9ed>夹攻</color>。

description.en: (Triggered Effect) After being hit, uses <color=#28d9ed>Come Here, Hound</color> on the enemy with the lowest Max Health. Has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Petrified</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
description.kr: (발동 효과) 피격 후 최대 체력이 가장 낮은 적에게 <color=#28d9ed>와줘, 하운드</color>를 사용합니다. <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 확률로 대상에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>석화</color>를 부여합니다.
description.jp: (発動効果)ダメージを受けた後、最大HPが最も低い敵単体に<color=#28d9ed>【来て、ハウンド】</color>を使用する。<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で対象に<color=#28d9ed>石化</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。
description.zh: (触发效果)受到攻击后,使生命值上限最低的敌人使用<color=#28d9ed>来吧,哈恩德</color>。有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率对目标造成<color=#28d9ed>石化</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

name.jp: パンデモニウムのために!

description.en: Reduces the duration of <color=#28d9ed>buffs</color> granted to the target by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn</color>, then attacks the enemy.\nThis skill penetrates <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> of the target's Defense.
description.kr: 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>강화 효과</color> 지속 턴을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소시킨 후 적을 공격합니다.\n이 스킬은 대상의 방어력을 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 무시합니다.
description.jp: 対象の<color=#28d9ed>強化効果</color>の持続ターンを<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少させた後、敵単体にダメージを与える。\nこのスキルは対象の防御力を<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>無視する。
description.zh: 使目标的<color=#28d9ed>强化效果</color>持续回合数减少<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>后,攻击敌人。\n无视该技能目标的<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>防御力。

description.en: When the caster is hit, if at least one ally is not affected by a <color=#28d9ed>debuff</color>, increases the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> by <color=#28d9ed>40%</color>.
description.kr: 자신 피격 시 아군 중 한명이라도 <color=#28d9ed>약화 효과</color>가 적용되지 않는다면 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>가 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 증가합니다.
description.jp: 自分が攻撃を受けた時、味方の中に<color=#28d9ed>弱体効果</color>が付与されていない者が1人でもいる場合、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>が<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>UPする。
description.zh: 自身受到攻击时,若我方至少有1名未附带<color=#28d9ed>弱化效果</color>的队友,则使自身的<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>。

description.en:
Every 4 turns, the caster enters the <color=#28d9ed>Enraged</color> state and gains irremovable Attack Up, Critical Hit Chance Up, and Damage Taken Down effects for <color=#28d9ed>3</color> turns.
<color=#28d9ed>Enraged Activation & Ultimate Skill</color>:
Revives all fallen allies with <color=#28d9ed>Resurrect (Enhanced)</color>,
then deals heavy damage to all enemies,
and has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Taunt</color> on all enemies for <color=#28d9ed>1</color> turns.
(Ignores Effect Resistance)
description.kr: 4턴 마다 <color=#28d9ed>광폭화</color> 상태로 전환하고, 자신에게 해제되지 않는 공격력 증가/치명 확률 증가/피해 감소 효과를 <color=#28d9ed>3턴</color> 동안 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#28d9ed>광폭화 돌입과 필살기</color> : 사망한 아군 전체를 <color=#28d9ed>부활(강화)</color> 시킨 후 적 전체에게 큰 피해를 입히고 적 전체를 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>도발</color>합니다.(효과 저항 무시)
description.jp:
4ターンごとに<color=#28d9ed>【狂暴化】</color>状態に切り替わり、
自分に解除不可の 攻撃力UP/会心率UP/受けるダメージDOWNを
<color=#28d9ed>3ターン</color>の間付与する。

<color=#28d9ed>【狂暴化】発動と必殺スキル</color>:
倒れた味方全体を<color=#28d9ed>復活(強化)</color>させた後、敵全体にダメージを与え、 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間、敵全体を<color=#28d9ed>挑発</color>する。(効果抵抗無視)
description.zh:
每经过4回合进入<color=#28d9ed>狂暴化</color>状态,并获得不可解除的 攻击力提升/暴击率提升/受伤减少,持续 <color=#28d9ed>3</color> 回合。

<color=#28d9ed>进入狂暴化与必杀技</color>:
使所有阵亡友军 <color=#28d9ed>复活(强化)</color>,随后对全体敌人造成巨额伤害,
并以 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 的概率在 <color=#28d9ed>1</color> 回合内对全体敌人施加 <color=#28d9ed>嘲讽</color>。(无视效果抵抗)
